name: BabyChapters.com
tag_list: baby, family, parenting, photosharing, print-on-demand, children, kids, memories, mothers, moms, childbirth
overview:
BabyChapters(TM) is a free online baby book that helps parents store their baby’s precious memories and share them with your family and friends. For those parents who also want a keepsake, BabyChapters.com offers an option to order their online baby book as a high-quality, professionally-printed hard-cover book.

BabyChaptersâ„¢ is designed around easy-to-use templates that even novice computer users can utilize to quickly create pages for their baby books. The website delivers a secure and private baby book experience while allowing parents to invite family and friends to view and comment the book. The service provides a range of options to help users to customize and personalize the appearance of their baby book.

BabyChaptersâ„¢ Online Baby Book currently includes: â€¢ Introduction: Provide an introduction to your baby with birth information and a photo â€¢ Family Tree: Offer information about parents, grandparents, and siblings â€¢ Journal: Keep a journal (illustrated with photos) of what is happening in your baby’s life â€¢ Milestones & Firsts: Store memories about your baby’s milestones and firsts (e.g., first crawl, first word) â€¢ Baby’s Favorites: Keep a list of your baby’s favorite things (e.g., favorite song) â€¢ Growth Charts: Track the growth of your baby’s height and weight â€¢ Guestbook: Let your family and friends write in your baby’s guestbook â€¢ Photo/Video Gallery: Store and share memorable photos and videos about your baby â€¢ Events & Gift List: Announce upcoming events (e.g., birthdays), invite guests, and keep a gift list â€¢ Invite/Manage Visitors: Invite family and friends to visit the baby book through a secure password â€¢ Order a Baby Book: Order your online content as a high-quality, professionally-printed hard-cover book (optional, starts at $27.95).
